name: Are you a space soldier ?
description:
Hey!

Today we open a playable test version of the "Are you a space soldier ?" game. 

The official Twitter profile:
https://twitter.com/are_u_a_space_S

Discord server :

https://discord.gg/SRNb7nS

What is "Are you a space soldier ?" :
It's a visual novel in a black and white style, in a sci fi universe where rice balls are main characters. You will be a space soldier and you will try to save a space station assaulted by aliens.

- 4 story lines

-a combat system
-an introduction to a deep universe
We hope you will like it and please consider giving feedback and bugs reports.
